overview: The second function of a movie synopsis involves condensing your story down to a page before starting on the script. Or, early in the process of writing it as you attempt to tighten up the story. What is a synopsis of a movie compared to an outline? Again, a movie synopsis is not to be confused with a treatment or a script outline. An outline is usually a longer, scene-by-scene and/or beat-by-beatThe second function of a movie synopsis involves condensing your story down to a page before starting on the script. title: TAKE MY LOVE
